title: Is Security Onion for me?
subtitle: Security Onion is deployed within all major industry verticals, in home offices, governments, and Fortune 500 enterprises.

title: Where is Security Onion installed?
subtitle: Security Onion is installed in nearly every country on the planet.

title: Why Security Onion?
subtitle: Security Onion is free, the source code is open, and it is created and maintained by cybersecurity professionals who use it every day.

title: Who uses Security Onion?
subtitle: We don't disclose our customer names. However, we love receiving positive feedback which encourages us to continue improving Security Onion!
